Name: Monsters!
About the game: Monsters! is a dual stick shooter with a retro feel complete with pixel art and leaderboards to achieve that good olâ€™ arcade feel. You play as a wizard with a magic staff that can shoot a variety of spells that gains power from the abominations you destroy. Explore the neverending dungeons filled with wyverns, beholders, and other creatures from your nightmares. How will you fare against the waves of failed creations who seek to destroy you? And more importantly, how high can you get your score in the process? Good luck and have fun!
